Description.name: Description0
Description.content: VFS URI of the PDF for which the thumbnail should be created.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Height of the generated thumbnail. Given as integer value, specifying the number of pixels. By default the height is set to -1, which means that it is chosen automatically dependent on the PDF.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Width of the generated thumbnail. Given as integer value, specifying the number of pixels. By default the width is set to -1, which means that it is chosen automatically dependent on the PDF.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Format of the generated thumbnail. Either jpg or png. Default:Â  png.
